class  Util::CounterManager
 Management of counters to collect in order to produce statisticsEach process generates an Counters data that correspond to a set of counters (user defined, applications defined...). These Counters are cumulated in order to produce global statistics about the execution. This operation involves an field by field accumulation with various cumulative operators (+, max, min ). A set of userdefined field exist. That could be re-used in order to cumulate order counter. More...
